I'm familiar with HTML5, I'm currently learning semantics standards and code cleanliness.
In projects I use the SASS preprocessor, currently I am learning the BEM methodology to improve the purity of my code.
I have experience working with Bootstrap, but Flexbox / Grid also is not a stranger to me.
I use the facilities introduced by ES6 / ES7.
In my daily work, I use Gulp and the NPM package manager.
In addition, when working on projects, I use the GIT version-control system.
